comment.author: 72347661@N02
comment._content:
According to published sources the SF model was a single-seater with emergency flotation gear. I don't see either of these modifications here. An update to these sources would be nice so we know why this one is an SF.
Stig

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/avis1951] I think that you are correct. This is just a VE-7, according to www.history.navy.mil/avh-1910/APP09.PDF For A-5971
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
